official_title: A bill to amend the Privacy Act of 1974 to allow the disclosure of information regarding individual constituents to Members of Congress.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Revises the Privacy Act of 1974 to allow the disclosure of information regarding individual constitutents to individual Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Privacy Act of 1974 to allow the disclosure of information regarding individual constituents to Members of Congress.
